title: CBDT Chief Announces Imminent Release of Draft Income-tax Rules and Forms for Income Tax Act, 2025
content:
# CBDT Chief Announces Imminent Release of Draft Income-tax Rules and Forms for Income Tax Act, 2025

Ek important update hai for all taxpayers and professionals! Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) ke Chairman ne recently announce kiya hai ki Draft Income-tax Rules and Forms for the Income Tax Act, 2025, bahut jald release kiye jayenge.

*   **What was announced:** CBDT Chairman Ravi Agrawal confirmed that new income tax forms and rules will be issued "within February 2026".
*   **Purpose:** These drafts are for the new Income Tax Act, 2025, which will come into effect from April 1, 2026.
*   **Stakeholder Consultation:** The draft rules and forms will be opened for public consultation, allowing stakeholders to provide their inputs before finalization. This step aims to ensure ease of compliance and simplification of the tax framework.
*   **Availability:** The official Income Tax Department website now lists "Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026" and "Draft Income-tax Forms 2026" as new updates.

This is a crucial step towards the implementation of the new Act, ensuring a smoother transition for all.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.incometax.gov.in)

(Please navigate to the 'What's New' or 'Quick Access NEW' section on the homepage to find "Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026" and "Draft Income-tax Forms 2026".)

*Published on: 7 February 2026*
